review: I use the AppleTV with all of the Apple products in my house and it works seamlessly. I have an Apple AirPort Extreme Base Station that has an external HDD plugged into the back and together with the AppleTV I am able to easily access all of the digital media on the HDD without having to get off the couch. I have only had it about 3 weeks but it's one of those things I'd hate to go withou after owning one.My only complaint as of now is the Netflix app needs a lot of improving. I am used to Streaming Netflix through my Xbox 360 and the Netflix app on it is much better. The AppleTV Netflix retires far too many button pushes to get things goin and doesn't have continuous play like the Xbox. I am able to get around this though by just steaming it from my computer to the AppleTV.Overall this gets a 10 out of 10 from me.

review: Apple TV is great for Netflix and quickly ordering movies from Apple.  For those unfamiliar with Netflix, the interface actually does vary between devices you use to access the service.  Apple TV provides the best Netflix interface I have seen  The Radio app is also a great feature, 100's of stations to choose from.  The photo streaming is nice if you have flikr or icloud, but is clunkier than you would expect to set up.  By far the best feature if you have apple devices like iPad, iPhone, etc.  is the ability to show audio, video or mirror your screen from your device.  Lots of fun to surf Youtube videos this way.  if you get tired of the radio stations, it is straightforward to stream something like Pandora from your iPod, just one button to push.  The only problem is poor quality, especially the wifi connection.  The support forums are full of horror stories with this device.  My wifi just stopped working after 9 months.  Trying to get warranty service for it, but its really a poor showing from Apple.  If you buy it, cross your fingers and hope for the best--and maybe spring for the extended support contract for this one.  Usually that's a money loser, but it will likely pay off for this product.
